project.name: J-C190B-LUCE-09-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF03-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32767 or 32766, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an infinite loop.

iopair.name: J-C190B-LUCE-09-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="2000" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="32767" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_SMBarluXNbOAQR5awfM2 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_pRTP466077 OR (NOT finished_te9j4Bf8vb AND NOT (controlled_exit_1qKpDlqQy8 OR continued_execution_gRtSuU5WAd)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_pRTP466077 OR (NOT finished_te9j4Bf8vb AND NOT (controlled_exit_1qKpDlqQy8 OR continued_execution_gRtSuU5WAd))) OR controlled_exit_1qKpDlqQy8)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_pRTP466077 OR (NOT finished_te9j4Bf8vb AND NOT (controlled_exit_1qKpDlqQy8 OR continued_execution_gRtSuU5WAd)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_pRTP466077 OR (NOT finished_te9j4Bf8vb AND NOT (controlled_exit_1qKpDlqQy8 OR continued_execution_gRtSuU5WAd))) OR controlled_exit_1qKpDlqQy8))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
